title: Don’t Need Your Love
lyrics:
[Verse 1: HRVY]
Yeah, you and I fell in too deep
Love, hate, no in between
Too little, too late for us, oh-oh
Those dimples on your face
Don't work the same these days
It's clear we've both had enough, yeah, yeah, yeah
[Pre-Chorus: HRVY]
You think it's my heart you're holding
You still think you're all that I need, yeah, yeah, yeah
I know we're fire and ocean, yeah
You ain't got nothing on me
[Chorus: HRVY]
I don't need your love
If you're waiting for a comeback, hold on
I don't need your love
If you think I'm gonna come back. I won't
[Post-Chorus: All]
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it

[Verse 2: Renjun, 
Chenle
]
찰나의 반짝임
이제는 바래진
추억은 먼지 같아, oh-oh
걷잡을 수 없이
우리의 시간은
이제는 끝이 났어, yeah, yeah, yeah
[Pre-Chorus: Jisung, 
Renjun
]
기억은 더 흐려지지
널 보던 내 눈빛까지, yeah, yeah, yeah
바람이 머물지 않듯, yeah
그대로 널 지나쳐
[Chorus: HRVY, 
Jeno
, 
Jaemin
]
I don't need your love
기다려도 소용없을 거야
I don't need your love
아마 그런 일은 없을 거야
[Post-Chorus: All]
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it

[Bridge: Jeno, 
Jaemin
]
Ring-ring, ring-ring
부재중 전화 또 부재중 전화
12시, 12시 반 2시 또 2시 반
스트레스 받아
미치겠어 제발 너 땜에
잠을 못 자
지금 도대체 뭔 생각으로
이러는 거야 no, don't say it
네가 아니라도 지금 내 옆엔
기댈 데가 많아
I don't want to go back
[Chorus: Renjun, 
HRVY
, 
Chenle
]
I don't need your love
If you're waiting for a comeback, hold on
I don't need your love
아마 그런 일은 없을 거야
[Post-Chorus: All]
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it

[Outro: HRVY, 
Renjun
, 
Chenle
]
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it
I don't need your love
Don't need it
Don't need it, need it, no
Don't need it
